import React from 'react' import Axios from 'axios'; import {serverUrlBorrower} from '../url' // import {serverUrlBorrower} from './url' import './../../support/css/profilenasabahdetail.css' import { Redirect } from 'react-router-dom' import {connect} from 'react-redux' import { Button, Modal, ModalHeader, ModalBody, ModalFooter } from 'reactstrap'; import Moment from 'react-moment' import { getProfileNasabahDetailFunction } from './saga'; import { getTokenClient,getTokenAuth, getTokenBorower } from '../index/token' class profileNasabahDetail extends React.Component{ state={rows:[],modalKTP:false,modalNPWP:false,npwp:null,ktp:null,gambarKTP:null,gambarNPWP:null} _isMounted = false componentDidMount(){ this._isMounted=true this.getDataDetail() } componentWillUnmount(){ this._isMounted=false } formatMoney=(number)=> { return number.toLocaleString('in-RP', {style : 'currency', currency: 'IDR'})} getDataDetail = async function (){ const param = {id:this.props.match.params.id} const data = await getProfileNasabahDetailFunction(param) if(data){ if(!data.error){ this.setState({rows:data.detailProfileNasabah,ktp:data.detailProfileNasabah.idcard_imageid,npwp:data.detailProfileNasabah.taxid_imageid}) }else{ this.setState({errorMessage:data.error}) } } } btnModalKTP =()=>{ this.setState({modalKTP:true}) if(this.state.ktp){ var config = { headers: {'Authorization': "Bearer " + getTokenBorower()} }; Axios.get(serverUrlBorrower+`client/imagefile/${this.state.ktp}`,config) .then((res)=>{ console.log(res.data) this.setState({gambarKTP:res.data.image_string}) }) .catch((err)=>{ console.log(err) }) }else{ this.setState({gambarKTP:'Gambar KTP kosong'}) } } btnModalNPWP =()=>{ this.setState({modalNPWP:true}) if(this.state.npwp){ var config = { headers: {'Authorization': "Bearer " + getTokenBorower()} }; Axios.get(serverUrlBorrower+`client/imagefile/${this.state.ktp}`,config) .then((res)=>{ console.log(res.data) this.setState({gambarNPWP:res.data.image_string}) }) .catch((err)=>{ console.log(err) }) }else{ this.setState({gambarNPWP:'Gambar NPWP kosong'}) } } btnModalCancelKTP=()=>{ this.setState({modalKTP:false}) } btnModalCancelNPWP=()=>{ this.setState({modalNPWP:false}) } render(){ if(getTokenAuth() && getTokenClient()){ return(
{/* ------------------------------------------------------FOTO KTP------------------------------------------------------ */} KTP Detail {/* */} {this.state.ktp?
:
{this.state.gambarKTP}
} {/* ------------------------------------------------------FOTO NPWP------------------------------------------------------ */} NPWP Detail {/* */} {this.state.npwp?
:
{this.state.gambarNPWP}
} {/* */}

Nasabah - Detail

{/* =========================================FIRST================================ */}
Id Nasabah : {this.state.rows.id}
Bank Nasabah : {this.props.name}
{/* */}
Rekening Peminjam : {this.state.rows.bank_accountnumber}
Pinjaman ke : NO DATA
{/* */}
Status Pinjaman : {this.state.rows.status}
Tanggal Register : {/* {String(this.state.rows.created_time).substr(0, String(this.state.rows.created_time).indexOf('T'))} */}
{/* ==============================SECOND===================================== */}
Informasi Pribadi
Nama: {this.state.rows.fullname}
Jenis Kelamin: {this.state.rows.gender}
No KTP: {this.state.rows.idcard_number}
No NPWP: {this.state.rows.taxid_number}
Email: {this.state.rows.email}
Tanggal Lahir:
Tempat Lahir: {this.state.rows.birthplace}
Pendidikan: {this.state.rows.last_education}
Nama Ibu Kandung: {this.state.rows.mother_name}
No HP: {this.state.rows.phone}
Status Pernikahan: {this.state.rows.marriage_status}
Nama Pasangan: {this.state.rows.spouse_name}
Tanggal lahir Pasangan:
Pendidikan Pasangan: {this.state.rows.spouse_lasteducation}
Tanggungan (Orang): {this.state.rows.dependants}
{/* ==============================THIRD===================================== */}
Data Tempat Tinggal
Alamat: {this.state.rows.address}
Provinsi: {this.state.rows.province}
Kota: {this.state.rows.city}
RT/ RW: {this.state.rows.neighbour_association}/{this.state.rows.hamlets}
No Telp Rumah: {this.state.rows.home_phonenumber}
Kecamatan: {this.state.rows.subdistrict}
Kelurahan: {this.state.rows.urban_village}
Status Tempat Tinggal: {this.state.rows.home_ownership}
Lama Menempati Rumah: {this.state.rows.lived_for} Tahun
{/* ==============================FOURTH===================================== */}
Info Pekerjaan
Jenis Pekerjaan: {this.state.rows.occupation}
No Induk Pegawai: {this.state.rows.employee_id}
Nama Instansi: {this.state.rows.employer_name}
Alamat Kantor: {this.state.rows.employer_address}
Jabatan: {this.state.rows.department}
Lama Bekerja: {this.state.rows.been_workingfor} Tahun
Nama Atasan: {this.state.rows.direct_superiorname}
No Tlp Kantor: {this.state.rows.employer_number}
Gaji (Perbulan): {this.state.rows.monthly_income ? this.formatMoney(parseInt(this.state.rows.monthly_income)): 0}
Pendapatan Lain: {this.state.rows.other_income?this.formatMoney(parseInt(this.state.rows.other_income)):0}
Sumber Pendapatan Lain: {this.state.rows.other_incomesource}
{/* ==============================FIFTH===================================== */}
Lain - Lain
Nama Orang Tidak Serumah Yang Bisa Dihubungi: {this.state.rows.related_personname}
Hubungan: {this.state.rows.related_relation}
Alamat Rumah: {this.state.rows.related_address}
No Telp Rumah: {this.state.rows.related_homenumber}
No HP: {this.state.rows.related_phonenumber}
window.history.back()}>
) } if(getTokenAuth()){ return ( ) } } } const mapStateToProp = (state)=>{ return{ name:state.user.name } } export default connect(mapStateToProp) (profileNasabahDetail);
